styleString: * { transition: width 0.5s, height 0.5s, padding-left 0.5s, padding-right 0.5s, padding-top 0.5s, padding-bottom 0.5s, background-size 0.5s;} .comp.compTextArea ._label._noFloat{transform:translateY(calc(-150% - 10px))} span.commonCheckbox, span.commonTriStateCheckbox {border-radius: 4px;} span.commonCheckbox._checked ._thumb, span.commonTriStateCheckbox._true::before {transform: scale(0.75, 0.75) translate(21%, -20%);background-color: #FFFFFF;opacity: 1;}
name: style
